MS MCQs

    Manage website visits, redirect URLs, and social postings in Dynamics 365 Marketing

    »

    1. Which of the following social media accounts does Dynamics 365 Marketing allow you to schedule and post messages directly from your organization’s environment?

      Tumblr

      Instagram

      Facebook

      Google+


    2. Which of the following statements is true about how Dynamics 365 Marketing can track and measure customer engagement with your website?

      You can add a tracking script code to the pages of your website.

      Dynamics 365 Marketing automatically tracks your website without adding anything to it.

      You cannot track customer engagement of your website in Dynamics 365 Marketing.

      Dynamics 365 Marketing only allows you to track marketing pages that are created within Dynamics 365 Marketing.
